                               Description
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Jason tragically lost his young son when their SUV exploded. Now fighting
as a soldier in Iraq, the suicide bombings that occur around him on a daily
basis constantly remind him of losing his son. An army scientist approaches
Jason about an experimental virus that would create a squad of suicide bombers
they could use against the enemy. Uncertain if he has already been infected by
the virus, Jason must struggle to decipher which explosions are real and which
are in his head.
